Approved Tools.name: Tool Runner
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 01.08.2020; tool used to invoke CA-CIE tools and verify QA status

Approved Tools.name: Fingerprinter
Approved Tools.description: qualifed on 01.15.2020; tool used to generate hash tag ids of files/directories

Approved Tools.name: Handprinter
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 01.15.2020; tool used to batch process the generation of fingerprints

Approved Tools.name: RET-2-STOMP
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 01.23.2020; tool used to generate the meteoric recharge boundary condition cards for the STOMP model input file using RET output.

Approved Tools.name: Inactive Nodes
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 02.04.2020; tool used to determine the number of active and inactive nodes in the uppermost five model layers.

Approved Tools.name: Patchbowl
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 02.04.2020; tool used to modify STOMP soil zonation files to patch holes in the silt layers of the perching silt layer in the 200 E Area.

Approved Tools.name: SS STOMP Input File Generator
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 02.05.2020; tool used to generate the STOMP Input file input_SS for the steady-state simulation.

Approved Tools.name: Kingdom2STOMP
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 02.05.2020; tool used to generate a CSV file representing each node and its corresponding geologic formation in a model domain.

Approved Tools.name: Steady State Output Card Generator Tool
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 02.06.2020; tool used to generate an Output Control card for the steady-state simulation.

Approved Tools.name: CAST
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 02.06.2020; tool used to generate initial input cards for ESTOMP.

Approved Tools.name: CAST Supporting Libraries
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 02.06.2020; libraries supporting CAST.

Approved Tools.name: Kingdom to ArcGIS Grid Tool
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 02.06.2020; converts Kingdom point files (x, y, z) of surfaces (topographic surface or geologic structure tops) to ASCII raster files (asc).

Approved Tools.name: Split Kindgom Layer
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 02.06.2020; used to split one geology surface layer file into two sub-unit surface layer files.

Approved Tools.name: SWR Reducer
Approved Tools.description: v1.1 qualified on 03.05.2020 [renamed to vzreducer.py for unique name]; used to reduce solid waste release timesteps and rates to a size compatible for input into STOMP.

Approved Tools.name: Build Surface Flux Card
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 03.06.2020; This tool builds the Surfuce Flux Card for STOMP input file, it maps the STOMP grid to the P2R GW grid for the Stomp output.

Approved Tools.name: Transient Output Card Generator
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 03.16.2020; This tool creates the Output Control Card portion of a STOMP input file used for mass balance and transport production simulations.

Approved Tools.name: 2018 STOMP Input File Generator
Approved Tools.description: v1.1 qualified on 04.14.2020 (sig. figs. for dispersivity values in output file updated); This tool creates The 2018 STOMP Input File Generator Tool generates the 1943-2018 STOMP transport input file

Approved Tools.name: CA-IPP Tool
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 04.01.2020; This tool creates a comprehensive data set consisting of radionuclide and aqueous volume releases as a function of time for Central Plateau sites

Approved Tools.name: Aqueous Source Averaging Tool
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 04.02.2020; This tool averages aqueous source rates for user-specified waste sites and times

Approved Tools.name: Source Rerouting Tool
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 04.08.2020; This tool redistributes aqueous volume and contaminant loading for the U-10 Pond system and the B-3 Pond system

Approved Tools.name: Source Node Moving Tool
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 04.08.2020; This tool moves source nodes from the locations selected by the Source Cards Generation tool (ca-src2stomp.pl)

Approved Tools.name: Duplicate Source Nodes Tool
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 04.15.2020; This tool scans all sites within an input source card file, compares each site’s spatial representation against all the other sites, identifies any source nodes that overlap spatially, and writes the duplicate source node(s) to the output file

Approved Tools.name: Source to STOMP Tool
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 04.17.2020; This tool combines the site spatial information with the corresponding inventory and creates a STOMP-readable source card file containing grid cell definitions of fluxes (solute and/or liquid) for the model simulation

Approved Tools.name: Mass Balance STOMP Input File Generator Tool
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 04.27.2020; This tool generates the mass balance STOMP transport input file

Approved Tools.name: RTD STOMP Input File Generator Tool
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 04.28.2020; This tool generates the 2018 – RTD year STOMP transport input file

Approved Tools.name: RTD IC Tool
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 05.05.2020; This tool scans an input source card file and a steady-state STOMP input file and generates Initial Conditions Cards for RTD restarts

Approved Tools.name: 12070 STOMP Input File Generator Tool
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 05.06.2020; This tool generates the 2018 (or RTD year if the model has RTD) - 12070 STOMP transport input file

Approved Tools.name: STOMP Surface File Merge Tool
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 05.14.2020; This tool merges STOMP Surface File data from two consecutive STOMP simulations (e.g., Surface Files for the 2018 to RTD year simulation and for the RTD year to 12070 simulation)

Approved Tools.name: STOMP Surface File to P2R Tool
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 05.15.2020; This tool combines STOMP Surface File data for a selected solute from each P2R cell that intersects the model domain as listed in the model input file

Approved Tools.name: Surface Rate Interpolator
Approved Tools.description: v1.1 qualified on 10.15.2020; This tool takes STOMP output or other time series data with similar format and extrapolates the time series into a uniform yearly format; v1.1 updates include command line execution and stepwise functionality

Approved Tools.name: HSSM Builder
Approved Tools.description: v1.2 qualified on 10.14.2020; This tool builds a Hydrocarbon Spill Screening Model (HSSM) package for MT3D modeling purposes; v1.2 added toggle stepwise functionality and resolved issue in checking file

Approved Tools.name: CalcDose
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 07.27.2020.  Update on 08.10.2020; This tool calculates the dose given dose factors and groundwater concentrations

Approved Tools.name: maxDose
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 08.11.2020; This tool calculates the maximum dose over regions and time intervals given the output from CalcDose.

Approved Tools.name: sumDose
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 08.19.2020; This tool calculates the total dose by summing over multiple COPCs.

Approved Tools.name: sumDoseDB
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 08.27.2020; This tool calculates the total dose by summing over multiple COPCs; same as sumDose, but accepts very large files.  Updated 2020-08-27 to process user-specified dose pathways

Approved Tools.name: CIE Source Rerouting Tool
Approved Tools.description: v1.1 (T4 Ponds addition) qualified on 10.07.2020; this tool redistributes wastewater volumes and contaminant inventories (H-3, I 129, Sr-90, Tc-99, total U, Cr, NO3 and CN) for the 216 U 10 Pond system, the 216-B-3 Pond system, and T4 Pond System

Approved Tools.name: maxDoseDB
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 08.26.2020; This tool calculates the maximum dose over regions and time intervals given the output from CalcDose.; same as maxDose but accepts very large files.

Approved Tools.name: CIE Steady State STOMP Input File Generator Tool
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 08.26.2020; this tool generates the STOMP Input file input_cie_SS for the CIE steady-state simulation

Approved Tools.name: CIE Transient Output Card Generator Tool
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 09.08.2020; this tool creates the Output Control Card portion of a STOMP input file used for mass balance and transport production simulations

Approved Tools.name: CIE 2018 STOMP Input File Generator Tool
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 09.08.2020; this tool generates the 1943-2018 STOMP transport input file

Approved Tools.name: CIE RTD STOMP Input File Generator Tool
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 09.15.2020; this tool generates the 2018 – RTD year STOMP transport input file

Approved Tools.name: CIE 3070 STOMP Input File Generator Tool
Approved Tools.description: v1.1 qualified on 09.30.2020; this tool generates the 2018 (or RTD year if the model has RTD) - 3070 STOMP transport input file

Approved Tools.name: CIE-IPP Tool
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 09.18.2020; this tool generates a comprehensive data set consisting of radionuclide and chemical aqueous volume releases as a function of time for Central Plateau sites

Approved Tools.name: CIE Mass Balance STOMP Input File Generator Tool
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 09.24.2020; this tool generates generates the mass balance STOMP transport input file

Approved Tools.name: Inventory Preprocessing Tool
Approved Tools.description: qualified on 11.20.2020; this tool to create a comprehensive data set consisting of radionuclide and/or chemical aqueous volume releases as a function of time for Central Plateau sites

ARGUMENTS.help: The name of the tool to invoke; enclose in quotes
Arguments passed to tool; enclose in quotes
Manual mode. Used to record a human action in the log. No 'Name' or 'Arguments' required. Takes one argument, a description (enclose in quotes); logs that and quits.
Log run but does not execute; helpful for testing
Path to a log file (default is stdout)
